hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
hostname env pwd
export JENKINS_BUILDS_DIR=/scratch/jenkins/archived-builds
# Load wit/wake modules . /sifive/tools/Modules/3.2.10/init/sh #module load sifive/wake/0.17.1 #module load sifive/wit/0.11.1 #module load riscv-tools #module load python/python/3.7.0 python --version
# Create the Jenkins build dir if it doesn't exist mkdir -p $JENKINS_BUILDS_DIR cd $JENKINS_BUILDS_DIR echo $PWD
mkdir -p $JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER cd $JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER echo $PWD
#git clone -b cxmt_fb_norisours_rebase git@github.com:sifive/federation.git git clone -b sc_fb_integrate git@github.com:sifive/federation.git
cd federation export FEDERATION_GIT_HASH=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` export FEDERATION_ROOT=`pwd` export DASHBOARD_INFO="10.14.135.139,runner,kNHUUhP5AZkthSC8,8202,federation,${FEDERATION_GIT_HASH},fbsouth1_smcu_sim,e31" export TEST_TIMESTAMP=`date '+%m%d%Y%X'`
./scripts/quick-submodule-update . rc.d/riscv-tools.bashrc BUILD_DIR=builds ./generate-build fbsouth1_smcu_sim BUILD_DIR=build_sc ./generate-build fbsouth1_smcu_sim_sc
#git clone git@github.com:sifive/benchmark-mem_probe.git software/tests/benchmark-mem_probe git clone -b adjust_macro git@github.com:sifive/benchmark-mem_probe.git software/tests/benchmark-mem_probe git clone git@github.com:sifive/ooo_probe.git software/tests/ooo_probe git clone git@github.com:sifive/lsu_probe.git software/tests/lsu_probe git clone git@github.com:sifive/benchmarks.git software/tests/benchmark_script git clone git@github.com:sifive/systemc_ipdelivery.git software/tests/systemc_ipdelivery git clone git@github.com:sifive/benchmark-frontend.git software/tests/benchmark-frontend
#link GEM5 ln -sf /work/sifive-gem5 software/tests/systemc_ipdelivery/sifive-gem5 #probuf for systemc #export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/work/sifive-gem5/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH} export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/work/sifive-gem5/build/SF_RISCV:/work/sifive-gem5/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}
export MEM_PROBE_ROOT=`realpath software/tests/benchmark-mem_probe` export OOO_PROBE_ROOT=`realpath software/tests/ooo_probe` export LSU_PROBE_ROOT=`realpath software/tests/lsu_probe` export BENCH_SCRIPT=`realpath software/tests/benchmark_script` export SYSTEMC_IP=`realpath software/tests/systemc_ipdelivery` export FRONTEND_ROOT=`realpath software/tests/benchmark-frontend`
cd build_sc/fbsouth1_smcu_sim_sc pwd . ./load-modules echo "$LD_LIBRARY_PATH" make run-systemc MODEL="CoreIPSubsystemAllPortRAMTestHarnessSC" TEST_OUTLINE=${FEDERATION_ROOT}/software/tests/systemc_ipdelivery/test-outlines/systemc_fp_bw.outline EXTRA=enable LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}
python3 -m venv venv . venv/bin/activate python3 -m pip install cryptography python3 -m pip install pymysql python ${SYSTEMC_IP}/scripts/parse_frontport_bandwidth.py --simlog sim/sim-systemc/systemc_fp_bw.outline --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP"
deactivate
cd ${FEDERATION_ROOT}
cd builds/fbsouth1_smcu_sim pwd ls . ./load-modules python --version which python make sim cd sim
sed -i "/score_check/d" $FEDERATION_ROOT/software/tests/dhrystone/manifest.yml sed -i "/score_check/d" $FEDERATION_ROOT/software/tests/coremark/manifest.yml
#./sitest @$FEDERATION_ROOT/software/tests/ooo_probe/script/ooo_probe.outline +verbose >& /dev/null #./sitest -j3 @$LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/lsu_probe.outline +verbose >& /dev/null --nobuild #./sitest -j4 @$FEDERATION_ROOT/software/tests/benchmark-mem_probe/script/mem_probe.outline +verbose >& /dev/null #./sitest dhrystone +verbose --nobuild >& /dev/null #./sitest coremark +verbose --nobuild >& /dev/null
cat > fbsouth_perf.outline << EOF benchmark_names = %w[ coremark dhrystone ] benchmark_names.each do |name| run_test( configure_test( name: name, raw_plusargs: ["+profile"], program: { mem: 'memory_mem0', data_mem: 'memory_mem0', text_mem: 'memory_mem0', cppmacros: %w[BENCHMARK_NO_PRINT], env: 'abi', },
)) end bestset_test_names = %w[ ooo_probe/TestAdd ooo_probe/TestAnd ooo_probe/TestAuipc ooo_probe/TestCadd ooo_probe/TestCaddi ooo_probe/TestCli ooo_probe/TestCmv ooo_probe/TestCslli ooo_probe/TestDiv ooo_probe/TestLui ooo_probe/TestMul ooo_probe/TestOr ooo_probe/TestRem ooo_probe/TestSll ooo_probe/TestSlt ooo_probe/TestSra ooo_probe/TestSrl ooo_probe/TestSub ooo_probe/TestXor benchmark-mem_probe/stream benchmark-mem_probe/matrix_multiply benchmark-mem_probe/bw benchmark-mem_probe/mem_probe lsu_probe/TestForwarding lsu_probe/TestInterleave lsu_probe/TestByGroup ]
bestset_test_names.each do |name| run_test( configure_test( name: name, raw_plusargs: ["+profile"], program: { mem: 'memory_mem0', data_mem: 'memory_mem0', text_mem: 'memory_mem0', env: 'abi', },
)) end
mem_test = %w[ benchmark-mem_probe/bw benchmark-mem_probe/mem_probe ]
none_cacheable_target_block = %w[ tl_inter_sys_port_mem0 ]
mem_test.product(none_cacheable_target_block).each do |test,target| run_test( configure_test( name: test, raw_plusargs: ["+profile"], subdir: target, program: { mem: target, data_mem: target, text_mem: 'memory_mem0', cppmacros: %w[RANGE=4], env: 'abi', }, )) end
frontend_probe_test = %w[ benchmark-frontend/j64b_aligned benchmark-frontend/j128b_unaligned ] text_mem_list = %w[ memory_mem0 tl_inter_sys_port_mem0 ] cacheable_test_range = [256,128,64,32,16,8,4]
frontend_probe_test.product( text_mem_list , cacheable_test_range ) do |test,target,size| run_test( configure_test( name: test, raw_plusargs: ["+profile"], subdir: target+'/'+size.to_s, program: { mem: 'memory_mem0', data_mem: 'memory_mem0', text_mem: target, cppmacros: [ "TEST_SIZE="+size.to_s ,"ITERATION=4"], env: 'abi', }, )) end
frontend_probe_test.each do |test| run_test( configure_test( name: test, raw_plusargs: ["+profile"], subdir: "itim_mem/8", program: { mem: 'memory_mem0', data_mem: 'memory_mem0', text_mem: 'itim_mem', cppmacros: %w[TEST_SIZE=8 ITERATION=4], env: 'abi', }, )) end
EOF
./sitest -j8 @fbsouth_perf.outline +verbose
#python virtual env module load python/python/3.7.0 python3 -m venv venv . venv/bin/activate python3 -m pip install cryptography python3 -m pip install pymysql
python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/mem_probe/analyze_probe_result.py \ --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/mem_probe/simulation.err \ --detail \ --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP,memory_mem0" python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/bw/analyze_rtlsim_result.py \ --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/bw/simulation.err \ --detail \ --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP,memory_mem0" python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/mem_probe/analyze_probe_result.py \ --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/tl_inter_sys_port_mem0/benchmark-mem_probe/mem_probe/simulation.err \ --detail \ --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP,tl_inter_sys_port_mem0" python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/bw/analyze_rtlsim_result.py \ --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/tl_inter_sys_port_mem0/benchmark-mem_probe/bw/simulation.err \ --detail \ --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP,tl_inter_sys_port_mem0"
python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/stream/analyze_rtlsim_result.py --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/stream/simulation.err --detail --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/matrix_multiply/analyze_rtlsim_result.py --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/matrix_multiply/simulation.err --detail --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP"
#python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/mem_probe/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/mem_probe.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/mem_probe/simulation.err --detail --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" #python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/bw/analyze_rtlsim_result.py --rtlOut sim/mem_probe.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/bw/simulation.err --detail --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" #python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/stream/analyze_rtlsim_result.py --rtlOut sim/mem_probe.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/stream/simulation.err --detail --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" #python $MEM_PROBE_ROOT/matrix_multiply/analyze_rtlsim_result.py --rtlOut sim/mem_probe.outline/benchmark-mem_probe/matrix_multiply/simulation.err --detail --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP"
#OOO_ARRAY=(Add And Auipc Cadd Caddi Cli Cmv Cslli Div Lui Mul Or Rem Sll Slt Sra Srl Sub Xor) #for i in ${OOO_ARRAY[@]} #do # OOO_DASHBOARD_INFO=${DASHBOARD_INFO}",$TEST_TIMESTAMP,$i" # python $OOO_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/ooo_probe.outline/ooo_probe/Test${i}/simulation.err --to_dashboard $OOO_DASHBOARD_INFO #done
#python $BENCH_SCRIPT/scripts/parse_benchmark_score.py -r sim/coremark/simulation.err -e sim/coremark/program.elf -b coremark -f 1 -i 10 --dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" #python $BENCH_SCRIPT/scripts/parse_benchmark_score.py -r sim/dhrystone/simulation.err -e sim/dhrystone/program.elf -b dhrystone -f 1 -i 500 --dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP"
#python $LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/lsu_probe.outline/lsu_probe/TestForwarding/simulation.err --probeType TestForwarding --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" #python $LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/lsu_probe.outline/lsu_probe/TestInterleave/simulation.err --probeType TestInterleave --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" #python $LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/lsu_probe.outline/lsu_probe/TestByGroup/simulation.err --probeType TestByGroup --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP"
OOO_ARRAY=(Add And Auipc Cadd Caddi Cli Cmv Cslli Div Lui Mul Or Rem Sll Slt Sra Srl Sub Xor) for i in ${OOO_ARRAY[@]} do OOO_DASHBOARD_INFO=${DASHBOARD_INFO}",$TEST_TIMESTAMP,$i" python $OOO_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/ooo_probe/Test${i}/simulation.err --to_dashboard $OOO_DASHBOARD_INFO done
python $BENCH_SCRIPT/scripts/parse_benchmark_score.py -r sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/coremark/simulation.err -e sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/coremark/program.elf -b coremark -f 1 -i 10 --dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" python $BENCH_SCRIPT/scripts/parse_benchmark_score.py -r sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/dhrystone/simulation.err -e sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/dhrystone/program.elf -b dhrystone -f 1 -i 500 --dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" python $LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/lsu_probe/TestForwarding/simulation.err --probeType TestForwarding --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" python $LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/lsu_probe/TestInterleave/simulation.err --probeType TestInterleave --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP" python $LSU_PROBE_ROOT/script/analyze_probe_result.py --rtlOut sim/fbsouth_perf.outline/lsu_probe/TestByGroup/simulation.err --probeType TestByGroup --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP"
for i in `find sim/fbsouth_perf.outline -type d -name "benchmark-frontend"` do echo $i for j in `find $i -name "simulation.err"` do DIRNAME=`dirname $i` DIRNAME2=`dirname $DIRNAME` TARGET_MEM=`basename $DIRNAME2` python $FRONTEND_ROOT/analyze_rtlsim_result.py \ --rtlOut $j \ --detail \ --to_dashboard "$DASHBOARD_INFO,$TEST_TIMESTAMP,$TARGET_MEM"
done done
ls -al
